ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_elin | |- ( G e. ( SemiGrp i^i ExId ) <-> ( G e. SemiGrp /\ G e. ExId ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_simplbi | |- ( G e. ( SemiGrp i^i ExId ) -> G e. SemiGrp ) |
| 3 |  | #P_df-mndo | |- MndOp = ( SemiGrp i^i ExId ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_eleq2s | |- ( G e. MndOp -> G e. SemiGrp ) |
